title: Inception
description: Cobb is offered a chance to have his criminal history erased in exchange for performing the seemingly impossible task of "inception" – planting an idea into a target's mind

title: Parasite
description: exploring the stark contrast between two families from different socioeconomic backgrounds.

title: Amelie
description: follows the story of Amélie Poulain, a shy waitress in Montmartre, Paris, who embarks on a mission to spread joy and happiness to those around her

title: Spirited Away
description: The movie focuses on a young girl who is trapped in a sort of "spirit world"

title: The Godfather
description: It follows the Corleone family, a powerful Italian-American Mafia family in New York, as they navigate the treacherous world of organized crime in the 1940s

title: Life Is Beautiful
description: The film follows Guido's playful and imaginative approach to life, even as he and his family are caught up in the horrors of the Holocaust

title: Pan's Labyrinth
description: The story follows Ofelia, a young girl who escapes the harsh realities of her new home with a cruel stepfather by immersing herself in a magical world

title: 3 Idiots
description: the story of three engineering students

title: The Intouchables
description: a French buddy comedy-drama that tells the story of an unlikely friendship between a wealthy quadriplegic, Philippe, and his newly hired caregiver, Driss, a young man from the projects who's recently released from prison

title: City of God
description: a French buddy comedy-drama that tells the story of an unlikely friendship between a wealthy quadriplegic, Philippe, and his newly hired caregiver, Driss, a young man from the projects who's recently released from prison

title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team must track down a dangerous weapon before it falls into the wrong hands.

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
description: As Hollywood's Golden Age is winding down during the summer of 1969, television actor Rick Dalton and his stunt double Cliff Booth endeavor to achieve lasting success in Hollywood while meeting several colorful characters along the way.

title: The Fith Element
description: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.
